Before the Twist happened in the dungeon, they were just some peasants. At hearing the rumors about the treasure of goblins, they expose their greedy nature. Even if the treasure is hidden in the recess of the dungeon, they still risk their lives seeking it.

When the Twist occurred, most of the citizens thought that it was the fulfillment of the prophecy. However, the evil dragon is still sealed, leaving the warrior nowhere to find, and the world intact. Therefore, people tend to believe that there are infinite treasures waiting in the dungeon.
There is always a daredevil who takes the lead in doing things. Raiding is no exception. Facing great temptations, folks will rise to respond whenever someone instigates them.
The savage wolves living in the dungeon, usually acting in packs.
The strongest and fiercest one in the wolves will become the head of the herd.
They were fighters who came to defeat the Terror Wolves before a curse was cast on them, which finally transformed them into the minions of the king and queen of the wolves.
Many mages came for the unknown knowledge buried in the dungeon, hoping to boost their power. The undercurrent of crises in the dungeon brings them to different groups of vulgar exiles.
The magic guardian in the dungeon, who no longer stuck to the job of securing the place after the Twist happened.
The exiles who infringed the Oath of Knight are usually called "Rogue Knight". This title actually refers to any knight who stands against the theocracy.

They were ordinary priests who only followed their routine in churches. The reason why they were exiled was that the political actions in the kingdom demanded so. To make their violations more convincing, many heathens suffer together with them.

Most of the exiles gather because they condemned unforgivable crimes or they lost their homes. These assassins, however, came here only with a desire for fortune, which has far surpassed the longing for the value of the wealth in the end.

He was once a scholar indulged in medical researches, and he mechanized his body to benefit the studying. Despite he was expelled to the dungeon for his haphazard researches, now he feels like settling in this place as he can cut the red tape and find proper research targets.

Rumor has it that the king and queen of the Terror Wolves were originally a human couple, unfortunately converted into werewolves for studying some forbidden magic. To prevent more innocent people from getting infected, they escaped to the dungeon. Currently, they have become two entire beasts, expanding the influence of the werewolf curse wildly.

Rumor has it that the king and queen of the Terror Wolves were originally a human couple, unfortunately converted into werewolves for studying some forbidden magic. To prevent more innocent people from getting infected, they escaped to the dungeon. Currently, they have become two entire beasts, expanding the influence of the werewolf curse wildly.

Legend has it that the Goddess of Kyvir created many magic constructions to protect the place where the evil dragon is sealed. The Spike Guardian is one of the kinds, which become equally hostile towards everyone after the Twist.

Legend has it that the Goddess of Kyvir created many magic constructions to protect the place where the evil dragon is sealed. The Silence Guardian is one of the kinds, which become equally hostile towards everyone after the Twist.
Most of the exiles have no bottom line of reaching their goals. Taking advantage of cannon fodder is also one of their common choices.
The Evil God is not completely demonic, for it preserves the same mighty power as the other gods did, but does no good deeds. It simply follows its whim for most of the time, bringing them the title.
The offspring of the Evil God, by whom they are blessed for their faithfulness and the bloodline.
Arcanists from another country. Nobody knows their true intention of entering the dungeon.

A guardian that has fallen asleep. It is said that these stone golems have been transformed into the watchdogs of the treasury. Strangely, however, there is no record saying that goblins master the technique of reconstructing magic constructions.
Hidden in the recess of the dungeon, this imp can let out ear-piercing screams.
Hidden in the recess of the dungeon, this imp can let out a sound that resembles whispers by your ears.
Hidden in the recess of the dungeon, this imp can let out a sound that resembles the breathing of humans, which always confuses unprepared adventurers.
Hidden in the recess of the dungeon, this imp can let out a thunder-like roar.

The Piercers used to protect the witches in the kingdom. But the witches went evil due to forbidden spells and thus were executed. Therefore the piercers were also exiled and became rogue.  Treated unfairly, the Piercers nevertheless stick to the Oath of Knight.

Derived from terror, the ghost deprives humans of their spirits and absorb them. Rumor has it that the imps in the dungeon are the transformation of human spirits, the sounds of which are identical to that of the victims last made.
Trolls with low intelligence that always use mere strength to solve problems. Anyone who tried to reason ends up to be their food.

They are elf mages who master the power of elements. Elves always insist that magic originated from the Goddess of Kyvir. To reveal the secrets of magic, the Elementalist arrived at the dungeon when the Twist happened in an attempt to seek answers from the legendary prophet.
This monster is more like experiment failure, surrounded by smothering miasma.

Legend has it that the Goddess of Kyvir created many magic constructions to protect the place where the evil dragon is sealed. The Insulation Guardian is one of the kinds, which become equally hostile towards everyone after the Twist.

Although these Swordswomen are a part of the exile army, they usually act alone, as nobody else believes that a female is capable of wielding a sword on the battlefield, let alone the fact that these women are actually masters in using swords in the army.
Seal protectors that stick to their duty. These guardians can attack with the war hammers on both hands easily while an ordinary soldier feels exhausted holding one of the hammers with two hands.
A scholar that is obsessed with studying the twist of time and space in the dungeon, and usually conducts incomprehensible researches in it.
Seal protectors that obtain the power of rebirth, their bodies covered by thick ice.
They used to be adorable higher priests and now they have descended to be the servants of devils. Those who hold the deepest faith would be most likely to get stray when their faith collapses.
A cold-blooded witch. She is said to be the survivor of the execution after the study on forbidden magic went out of control.
A beast of incalculable moods. There are few records depicting this beast.

Golems that are equipped with a set of thick stone armor. Judging from its appearance and structure, it might be a synthesized creature, either a kind of guardians or a failed product of some researches.
They seldom feel somber as they keep their habit of abusing alcohol even in the dungeon.
Timid but cunning, these native goblins become the servants of humans after the dungeon is occupied.
The spirit of a hero was instilled into the shield, making it a shield with self-consciousness, and it still keeps its faith till now.
The spirit of a hero was instilled into the longsword, making it a longsword with self-consciousness, and judging from its body, it can be asserted that it has slain countless enemies.
The spirit of a hero was instilled into the orb, making it an orb with self-consciousness, and it still glows as ever.
The spirit of a hero was instilled into the staff, making it a staff with self-consciousness, and the elemental current is still running at its head.
The spirit of a hero was instilled into the dagger, making it a dagger with self-consciousness, and its reflection of light is threatening and scary as ever.
A determined ghost guardian that used to be a grandmaster at arms before it was deceased. Even if it does not have an actual body now, its determination of fulfilling its duty remains.
The avatar of the first paladin. To show the spirit of the paladin, is to protect what you cherish with the shield made of unshakable faith.
The avatar of the first paladin. To fulfill the will of the paladin, is to destroy any unfairness and evilness with the blade made of unshakable faith.
The one in the stone coffin has become an appalling demon due to the Twist.
The stone stele that was craved with the prophecy has become a demon with self-consciousness.
The soul that insulted gods has been transformed into a three-headed shadow demon due to the Twist.
The soul that betrayed the king has been transformed into a three-headed petrified demon due to the Twist.
Originally a seal guardian, the monster is now a brutal killing machine.
Originally a seal guardian, the monster has become a poisonous creature since its body was utterly transformed due to the Twist.
A devil inside people's minds, growing increasingly stronger as people fall deeper in confusion. Only those who are strong-minded can conquer this devil.

Unlike most card games, you must actively choose when you want to use Redraw during combat in Kyvir: Rebirth.

Redraw can only be used once per turn. It will place all current cards from your main hand and off hand into the discard piles. Then draw to fill both hands from their respective draw piles.

Playing Scatter Shot will deal damage to all enemy targets.

You also have a new card in your off hand: Gather Arrows.

The tome of prophecies has given rise to assorted prophetic cards. These prophetic cards will affect you at the beginning of each rebirth.

In this menu, you can change the various equipments you have acquired during exploration.

Each category of equipments will directly influence one of your character's attributes. Some equipment even come in sets and have special properties when equipped together. Don't be afraid to try out different builds.

You can modify your decks at any point during exploration.

Each deck must have a deck size of at least 12. You may receive communal cards during exploration. Utility cards are different from your starting cards in that you can include them in both your main-hand deck and off-hand deck.
Exhausted cards can only be used once before being permanently removed from your deck. Exhausted cards do not count towards your deck size.
